choices: The Steel Tribe (Canids, Felines and Hyenas)
The Copper Tribe (Leporids, Murids and Sciurids)
The Gold Tribe (Equines, Cervids and Bovines)
1.content:
The world used to be a good place both for humans and seulnians, of course, it wasn’t perfect but at least anybody had a chance to do something with their lives. Until the last great war happened. A global conflict that ended up destroying society to its very foundations and leaving very few survivors. Hundreds of years later the world has recovered from the disaster, nature has reclaimed the ruined cities covering everything the eye could see. After the great disaster people had to reorganize and they did so in tribes. Nowadays, family is dictated by the tribe you belong to and each of its members are to be considered brothers or sisters. Each tribe is unique and has a determinate way of life.

Which tribe do you belong to?

Keep in mind there are humans in all the tribes.
1.title: The Tribes

11.content:
Composed by Canids, Felines, Hyenas and humans.

They live in the valleys, deserts and savannas, creating small towns that are expanded as time goes on, eventually becoming cities.

This tribe specializes in hunting and fighting, focusing their efforts in the offensive. They are known as the proudest of all the tribes. They rely on their sharp senses to track their prey and their brutal unarmed combat and weapons to kill their adversaries.

Canids are very good at tracking and surrounding their enemies. They rely on teamwork to not give the enemy a chance.

Felines are good at traversing in vertical environments and overcoming all kind of obstacles with their natural agility. They prefer to be stealthy and attack an enemy the moment they leave their guard down.

Hyenas are exceptionally brutal with their strength. They tend jump directly into the fight preferring to end it as quickly and messy as possible.

And humans are the ones responsible for the creation of weapons, armor and the planning of new combat strategies. They even leave traps and alarm systems around their territory to ensure the control they have over it. It is best not to mess with them.

Who is the protagonist?
11.title: The Steel Tribe (Canids, felines and Hyenas)

12.content:
Composed by Leporids, Murids, Sciurids and humans.

They live in the ruins of the abandoned cities, in its periphery and in the forests closest to them.

They are the most numerous of all the tribes. They are known to be the most inventive and resourceful of all the tribes. Having also a special interest over the performing arts (music, dance and theater). They use all sorts of long-range weapons and traps to defend their territory.

The Murids have an exceptional sense of orientation and moving in tight dark spaces. For this reason, they travel in the sewers and through abandoned buildings of the cities in search of resources they can use and a safe place to stablish their homes.

Leporids are incredible agile, being able to jump to great heights, move at great speed and give bone breaking kicks with their powerful legs. Not to mention their great hearing range, ideal to detect danger. They have a great appreciation for music and dance. Their homes are basically big burrows, connected with on another, forming an enormous web of households in the underground.

Sciurids are innate climbers, able to jump from tree to tree at vertiginous speed. They are good at finding all sorts of valuable objects, trading and have a great appreciation of visual arts, reason why they also make handicrafts. They make their homes up in giant trees and connect them to each other by bridges. These are ideal to keep vigilance over the territory.

Humans are not something to mess with. Given the great quantity of resources their seulnian brothers and sisters collect, they can create an enormous variety of artifacts, tools, mechanisms and of course, lethal traps and guns. Even the strongest and most brutal of all seulnians should think twice before confronting directly a human with a gun and good hand/eye coordination.

Murids, leporids, sciurids and humans collaborate with each other by distributing their resources and doing expeditions together. This union is accomplished by stablishing safe routes and underground passages that connect the cities, their periphery and the nearby forests. This way is easier for everyone to move from one place to another and keep in touch. Not for nothing they are all from the same tribe. It’s very hard not to find members of all this families in the same place.

Unfortunately, humans don’t have the natural agility their seulnian brothers and sisters have, making them inefficient for expeditions. To solve this problem the seulnians resorted to carry their human brothers and sisters in their backs to not leave them behind. Given their natural strength, the weight of the humans is not a problem but rather how many humans can they carry on their backs before running out of space. Seulnians don't mind one bit doing this and even encourage it, but it’s understandable if there are humans who aren't comfortable with this solution.

Who is the protagonist?
12.title: The Copper Tribe (Leporids, Murids and Sciurids)

13.content:
Composed by Birds (only the flying type), Chiropterans and Humans.

They live in the mountains.

This tribe is known as the one that furrows the skies. They go wherever they want and leave as they please. They make incredible messengers, deliverers and bombers. If someone needs something to be delivered somewhere, they can surely do the job. They use bombs and long-range weapons to defend themselves.

Birds fly through the skies with grace, traveling great distances in a short amount of time. They can carry heavy objects in mid-flight without losing stability. Unfortunately, not all the birds can flight in the darkness of the night.

Chiropterans for their part share a lot of similarities with the birds, except for the fact that they can use echolocation to “see” in the dark, prefer to fly at night (ideal for night watch), sleep hanging in the ceilings upside down and can fold their wings like capes.

Humans craft all kinds of bombs to use against their enemies and long-range guns. Considering that humans are the only ones in the tribe who can’t fly, they must resort to be carried by their seulnian brother and sisters on their backs. This way not only they can accompany them but also provide support with their guns or smoke bombs to lose their enemies. Of course, humans also use parachutes, because you never know.

Everyone lives at the base and on top of the mountains by building enormous structures that are partially inside the mountains and the part that’s outside is a huge platform that serves as an “airport” to birds and chiropterans where they come and go to make their deliveries to other settlements and to prepare their equipment for expeditions or possible battles.

Who is the protagonist?
13.title: The Silver Tribe (Birds and Chiropterans)

14.content:
Composed by Equines, Cervids, Bovines and Humans.

They live in the deep in the forests ,land meadows in between.

The most secure and guarded of all the tribes. They are known as the most cultured of all the tribes, mainly for their nobility and interest in history, math, physics, architecture, visual arts and literature. They fight like ancient knights and follow a code of honor. For this reason, they, unlike the other tribes, focus their fighting efforts in their defense, with the great physic of the seulnians, the armors they wear and the shields they wield, it’s very, very hard to bring down even one of its members. As for their offense, they use medium, long-range and heavy weapons to fight.

Equines despite their heavy muscular bodies move quite fast, can carry incredible amounts of weight and can endure a lot of physical stress, allowing them to use heavy armors and weapons for battles.

Cervids are agile and can tackle their enemies with their big horns. They usually wear light armor and mid-range weapons.

Bovines body types vary from light to heavy. Depending on their species they can either wear light or heavy armors and wield light or heavy weapons.

Humans make talented blacksmiths, responsible for creating all kinds of durable armors and weapons. The also are involved in the architectural designs of the buildings.

They all live in walled cities. Within the walls there are all kinds of architectural wonders. Among these, the greats archives stand out, containing the knowledge of the old world. Unfortunately for them, a lot of it is missing.
It’s not hard to notice they are very distrusting of strangers, reason why they only open the gates of their cities to trade with reliable merchants and to send expedition groups.

Who is the protagonist?
14.title: The Gold Tribe (Equines, Cervids and Bovines)

choices: Mia, The alchemist blue poison dart frog
15.content:
Composed by Reptiles and Humans

They live in Jungles and Swamps.

This tribe specializes in medicine, botanic, chemistry and the creation of poisons. They take advantage of all the natural elements that surrounds them, including the ones produced by the reptiles themselves. They either use their natural weapons or their short and long-range weapons to defend themselves.

Reptiles are divided in many species, their agility, strength and endurance vary in each one. Likewise, they possess unique attributes depending on the species; Some are capable of living both in water and in land, other are natural climbers, other can camouflage with the environment, other can produce lethal or hallucinogen poisons and other are simply able to resist extreme temperatures. The majority would prefer to hide in the natural environment and ambush their enemies.

Humans experiment with the millions of plants available in the jungles and swamps to create medicinal drugs and with the help of their seulninans brothers and sisters, create new types of poisons to deal with their enemies. The are also responsible for the creation of unique weapons like blowguns with poisonous darts and mines that expel poisonous or somniferous gas.

They all make their homes in the trees or the middle of swamps, supported by thick wooden posts that hold the house above the water.
15.title: The Platinum Tribe (Reptiles)

info.brief_description: Stories of a post-apocalyptic world inhabited by humans and enormous anthros
info.description:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of Phanros where humans and Seulnians (really big anthropomorphic animals) try to live their lives in the 5 different tribes that rule the lands of the new world, facing all sorts of troubles and trying to stay together in mist of uncertainty.

Here are some things that are important to consider before adding content

What are Seulnians?

Seulnian is just the term used to refer to all the anthropomorphic animals that inhabit the world. There are so many species that is better to classify them in families or classes.

How many families or classes compose the seulnians?

The are 10 families and 2 classes.

-Canidae (Dogs, wolves, foxes, Jackals, etc)

-Felidae (House cats, Ocelots, Tigers, Panthers, etc)

-Hyaenidae (Hyenas)

-Leporidae (Rabbits and Hares),

-Muridae (Rats and Mice)

-Sciuridae (Squirrels).

-Chiroptera (Bats)

-Equidae (Horses, Zebras and Donkeys)

-Cervidae (Deer and Moose)

-Bovidae (Sheep, Goats, Impalas, etc)

-Reptiles (Lizards, salamandres, crocodiles, frogs, etc) and

-Birds (Only the flying type, like. Canaries, Howls, Parrots, Eagles, etc)

Is there something important to know about them?

All species have their unique attributes and behaviors. Not to mention the fact that all are individuals with their own personalities. However, all Seulnians have things in common.

-They are quite big in comparison to humans. Humans can barely reach their knees when standing side by side. Not to mention their great resistance, strength, speed and agility. Despite this disparity, Seulnians treat humans with the same respect they would give to one of their own.

-Compared to humans they are not very creative or innovative. Because of their natural advantages, they never had such a need to create in order to survive. Making them simple minded but not any less intelligent. They just have a hard time understanding abstractions and see the world in a more practical way. After all, why create hunting tools when you already have claws and sharp teeth? Well, humans may have a lot to tell you.

-All seulnians have an extreme behavior regarding love and hatred. They love their families with all their hearts and would do anything for them. But also, they would rip apart and drink the blood of anyone who would dare to hurt their loved ones.

-It seems very easy for seulnians to develop a great physique, even at a young age.

Wait, if there are anthropomorphic animals in this world then what do carnivores eat?

They eat enormous bug-like creatures, which meat resemble the ones of mammals. Also, fish are still a thing.

If seulnians are much bigger, stronger and resistant than humans, then how can a human defend against a seulnian enemy in direct combat?

The only way a human can have a fighting chance against a seulnian enemy is using weapons to attack their vital points, but not even this is a guarantee of success if the human doesn’t have the strength and precision required to penetrate their thick skin and considering they can only reach the knees of the seulnians, this ends up being an unreliable method. The most effective way for a human to defend against a seulnian is with the usage of guns or stealth.

This vulnerability is the reason why seulnians never allow humans to participate in battles unless they have the proper equipment to fight. It’s also the reason why seulnians have a sort of unwritten rule about how dishonorable and downright coward is for a seulnian to fight against an unarmed human.


Some small rules:

-Please respect the 13+ rating. Sex, drugs or alcohol can only be implied. Violence can be shown at moderate levels.

-The story can be narrated in 1°, 2° or 3° person. But I recommend that once it starts in one of those it remains as such. For the sake of consistency.

-Birds and reptiles don’t have mammary glands.

-Birds and Chiropterans have their wings on their backs leaving their arms and hands free.

-Snakes are basically nagas.

-No species can reproduce with each other.

-You are free establish the type of relationships between the tribes. Are the Copper and Silver tribes allied with each other while being enemies with the Steel tribe? Are all at peace or at war with each other?

-Have fun!!!
